item.description: My main interest consists of neuronal modelling and data analysis, with use of Machine Learning inspired techniques and particular interest in Bayesian Inference applications. Currently pursuing a Master of Science in Neuroengineering at Technical University of Munich. At the moment working for INCF with Brian 2 as a part of Google Summer of Code, where I develop a new Model Fitting Toolbox, aiming to fit traces and spike trains to neuronal models.
